H1.text: what is the currency of germany now. German Pound

H2.text: what is the currency of germany now. Mark

H3.text: what is the currency of germany now. Euro

A4.text: The euro is the sole currency of 20 EU member states: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Cyprus, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, and Spain.

A5.text: The earliest date was in Germany, where the mark officially ceased to be legal tender on 31 December 2001.
